title: Ola Electric e-scooter S1 X 2kWh gets PLI certification
description: Ola Electric announced that its S1 X 2kWh electric scooter has received compliance certification under the production linked incentive (PLI) scheme. This marks the company's fifth product to achieve this status, highlighting its manufacturing capabilities and supporting India's electric vehicle vision.
